description: Working with development of computer vision models, System and integration and Image generation
Worked as a teaching assistant in a course on object oriented programming projects. And on object oriented programming.

Developed and launched an iOS app on TestFlight for beta-testing during the summer of 2024 together with a friend. The app is named ProgressX and is built with the language Swift utilizing the SwiftUI Framework and is a niche fitness app.

Worked primarily with letters of credit and collections. I also developed a tool in Python to digitize a large backlog with paper documents, which also could extract key numbers from them and export them to Excel. The tool used Tesseract (an OCR software) and a simple GUI built with TKinter.

Worked as an anti-ship soldier in the “bekämpningskompaniet” unit and also as a sonar operator in an anti-submarine group, first as a conscript but also as an employed soldier for a year after the conscription ended. During my time at Amf4, I was also responsible for the platoon's physical training.
